title: A Day at the Park
content: Last weekend,I went to the park with friend. We played games and had a picnic under a big tree.I saw ducks in the pond and birds in the sky.It was sunny and happy day.I love going to the park.

title: My Teacher
content: My teacher is amazing! She is kind,patient,and always helps us learn.Every day,she makes the classroom a fun place to be.I love how she explains thing clearly so that we can understand them easily.

title: My School
content: My school is an important part of my life.It is place where I learn,make friends, and have fun.I feel lucky to be a student there and look forward to each day of learning and making great memories with my friends and teachers.
